name: Colour Shield
description:
Colour Shield is a simple game built for the Fireside jam 2022. The theme for the jam was "Protect".

  • Use your mouse to aim the shield to deflect the bouncing projectiles.
  • A new projectile is added every 10 seconds.
  • Points are effectively the number of bounces made off of your shield.
  • If the circle is hit its hue will shift until it disappears completely.

Leave your Highscore in the comments!

______________________________________________________

UPDATE: Colour Shield v2.1 now has a slider to adjust the speed of the balls! The last position you leave the slider in will be remembered, so have a game playing around with the ball speed and then go for a highscore!
